item.title: [562] GiveAdmin And GiveMod Commands Help Please?!
item.dc:creator: @Heylo Heylo
item.description:
@Heylo wrote:

Hello i am trying to make a ::giveadmin and ::givemod command but im not sure on how to make this cause the one i already got wont work here is the give mod and give admin command code i already have.

if(cmd[0].equals("giveadmin") && (player.getUsername().equals("heylo") && (player.getUsername().equals("ludade")))) { Player other = World.getInstance().getPlayerList().get(World.getInstance().getIdFromName(command.substring((command.indexOf(" ") + 1)))); other.getActionSender().sendMessage("You have been promoted to a Heylo's Universe [562] ADMINISTRATOR!"); if (other != null) { other.rights = 2;
if(cmd[0].equals("givemod") && (player.getUsername().equals("heylo") && (player.getUsername().equals("ludade")))) { Player other = World.getInstance().getPlayerList().get(World.getInstance().getIdFromName(command.substring((command.indexOf(" ") + 1)))); other.getActionSender().sendMessage("You have been promoted to a Heylo's Universe [562] MODERATOR!!"); if (other != null) { other.rights = 1;

Read full topic
